answers.answer: Teak , how do you figure.I am suffering from boils on my face and styes continually.On the websites they say its due to a run down immune system.People at work are in my business at work,I have tested but my results are still negative-how can this be explained??I did have contact but I fear the wopman might have smeared some fluids on my sensitive areas.I am at wits end.
if you are having health issues, work with your dr.it's not hiv related and therefore not a concern of this forum.

Okey-I have one more question .Im worried about the percentage rating of 99.7 on the tests- When I went for councelling the councillor said there have been cases of people testing positive after as long as 3 years..Im now worried that the HIV in Africa may be a different kind of monster to that found in America where the experts are.How can I be sure I do not fall under these rare in America but not so rare in Africa cases.People at work continue to taunt me and im looking for answers...

question: I have been suffering from recurrent abscesses on my face since April 2009.I have had no less than 4 HIV antibody lab tests till yesterday.All of these tests have yielded nothing.I have also had a urine test for diabetes which has yielded nothing.My risk factor was from when I visited a prostitute in a dingy joburg flat (Saturday night).I only had condom protected oral sex performed on me.However I dozed of in her bed and when I awoke the condom had been removed.Now I was quite worried by this because on Thursday morning I suffered painful urine discharge.I also had a full std panel -which came back negative.I am constantly being harassed at work for this recurrence of septic sores and am now worried I may have a immune deficiency or special problem that causes HIV to remain undetectable.
title: Recurrent septic sores on my face
